chapter.title: ACT01 - Function Notation (Input, Output)
What is a Function?
chapter.p: A function is a rule, like a formula or a graph or a table of values, that assigns an ouput value for a given input.
The formula $y = {2^x}$ is a function because if you pick an input like x = 3, you get an ouput y = 8. (since $8 = {2^3}$)
